member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LightSense
member.summary: A LightSense module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: F:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LightSense.MAX_ILLUMINANCE
member.summary: The maximum amount of lux the sensor can detect before becoming saturated.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LightSense.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LightSense.ReadVoltage
member.summary: The voltage returned from the sensor.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LightSense.ReadProportion
member.summary: The proportion returned from the sensor.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.LightSense.GetIlluminance
member.summary: Returns the current sensor reading in lux.
member.returns: A reading in lux between 0 and MAX_ILLUMINANCE.
